title: Youtube just went even lower to the bottom with their shit...
body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pWaz7ofl5wQ Okay guys, i can bear with some weird stuff like DEMONitisation for no reason, or some shit recommendations, lags, or anything else, but this is whole another level... having YOUR ENTIRE GOOGLE SUSPSNDED FOR SPAMMING FEW EMOTES IS BEYOUND CRAZY. For everyone who thought riots automated ban system is dogshit, you've got something worse...i'm actually shocked. And very big respect to Markiplier who didn't abandoned his community and doing his best to help them get their accounts back, this is just hilarious.
